author: Polina F
title: Very good 3* hotel, excellent location
text:
Location is perfect. Less than 5 minutes to Printemps, Galeries Lafayette, Madeleine and Gare St.Lazare with several metro lines.
Very good hotel for 3 stars, nice design, everything is clean. Room is small (as in most hotels in Paris), but well equipped. Bathroom is nice and of a good size. Quite good wardrobe, hairdryer is not bad, good bed.
Breakfast room is small, but you can find quite a good variety of food, fresh juice and good coffee. And if you wake up too late to have a breakfast at the hotel, you can find a good Paul store/cafe very closely and take breakfast there.
Staff is helpful. Wifi works well. They offer shower gel, shampoo and soap as free toiletries.
Something to improve:
Room windows face the street where every morning very early there are guys coming to take away the garbage from big litter-bins, and they make super big noise for 15-20 minutes. It is hard to fall asleep again after it. And then you can hear all the noises from the street (motorcycles, people shouting etc.).
Would be great to have some more space for storage in the room.
It is forbidden to store food in the minibar, which is a pity, as sometimes you one can really need this.
